title: Police investigating West Oakland shooting
content:
OAKLAND — Police are investigating a shooting that injured at least four people Friday night in West Oakland.
The shooting was reported about 9:14 p.m. in the 3200 block of San Pablo Avenue, near Saint Andrews Plaza, said Oakland police.
No one has been arrested and police have not identified a motive, said Oakland police Officer Kevin Tran.
Check back for updates.
Bay City News Service contributed to this report. Contact Katrina Cameron at 925-945-4782. Follow her at Twitter.com/KatCameron91.
